mapper.insert:
select team_work_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into team_work_board(TEAM_BOARD_NO,MEM_NO,MY_BOARD_NO,TEAM_BOARD_TITLE, TEAM_BOARD_CONTENT,FSIZE,FILENAME,ORIGIN_FILENAME,CONTENTNO) values(#{teamBoardNo},#{memNo},#{myBoardNo},#{teamBoardTitle},#{teamBoardContent}, #{fsize},#{fileName},#{originFileName},#{teamBoardNo})
